newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela's CVG has $1.6 bln in pipeline projects.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela's CVG has $1.6 bln in pipeline projects.

text.p: Venezuela's industrial holding company Corporacion Venezolana de Guyana has some $1.6 billion in planned projects, CVG President Elias Ynaty said, which will help absorb most of the labour displaced by planned privatisations.
"The impact will be no more than five percent (of the current workforce)," he told reporters.
The CVG's group of aluminium and steel companies are due to be privatised at the beginning of next year.
Ynaty said the CVG had pipeline projects, in association with private capital, ranging from two new hot briquetted iron plants to timber and pulp plants as well as Las Cristinas gold mine.
